mapper.select: select C.*, P.*, (select club_approve_yn from club_member where club_code = C.club_no and emp_id=#{memberId}) club_approve_yn, (select club_manager_yn from club_member where club_code = C.club_no and emp_id=#{memberId}) club_manager_yn from (select * from club order by ${sort} asc) C left join club_photo P on C.club_no = P.club_no

select C.*, P.*,(select club_manager_yn from club_member where club_code = C.club_no and emp_id=#{memberId}) club_manager_yn from (select * from club where club_no in (select club_code from club_member where emp_id=#{memberId} and club_approve_yn = 'Y') order by ${sort} asc) C left join club_photo P on C.club_no = P.club_no

select C.*, P.*,(select club_manager_yn from club_member where club_code = C.club_no and emp_id=#{memberId}) club_manager_yn from (select * from club where club_no in (select club_code from club_member where emp_id=#{memberId} and club_approve_yn = 'N') order by ${sort} asc) C left join club_photo P on C.club_no = P.club_no

select C.*, M.*, (select dept_title from department where dept_code = M.dept_code) dept_title, (select job_title from job where M.job_code = job_code) job_title from (select * from club_member where club_code = #{clubNo}) C left join member M on C.emp_id = M.member_id

select * from (select C.*, M.*, (select dept_title from department where dept_code = M.dept_code) dept_title, (select job_title from job where M.job_code = job_code) job_title from (select * from club_member where club_code = #{clubNo}) C left join member M on C.emp_id = M.member_id) A where A.member_id like '%'|| #{keyword} || '%' or A.email like '%'|| #{keyword} || '%' or A.member_name like '%'|| #{keyword} || '%' or A.dept_title like '%'|| #{keyword} || '%' or A.job_title like '%'|| #{keyword} || '%'

select P.*, A.*, M.member_id, M.renamed_filename, M.member_name from (select * from club_plan) P left join club_plan_attendee A on A.club_plan_no = P.club_plan_no left join club_member C on A.club_member_no = C.club_member_no left join member M on M.member_id = C.emp_id where P.club_plan_no = #{clubPlanNo} order by A.club_plan_attendee_date desc

select * from club_plan P left join club_member M on P.club_no = M.club_code and P.member_id = M.emp_id where P.club_no = #{clubNo} and extract(month from club_plan_start) = extract(month from sysdate) order by club_plan_start asc
mapper.update: update club_plan set club_plan_title = #{clubPlanTitle}, club_plan_content = #{clubPlanContent}, club_plan_start = #{clubPlanStart}, club_plan_state = #{clubPlanState}, club_plan_place = #{clubPlanPlace}, club_plan_manager = #{clubPlanManager}, club_plan_color = #{clubPlanColor} where club_plan_no = #{clubPlanNo}
mapper.select: select * from club_notice N left join club_member C on N.club_member_no = C.club_member_no left join member M on C.emp_id = M.member_id where club_no = #{clubNo} order by club_notice_date desc
select * from club_member where emp_id = #{memberId} and club_code = #{clubNo}
select * from club_photo P left join club_member C on P.club_member_no = C.club_member_no left join member M on C.emp_id = M.member_id where club_no = #{clubNo} order by club_photo_date desc

select A.* , M.member_id, M.renamed_filename, M.member_name from club_plan_attendee A left join club_member C on A.club_member_no = C.club_member_no left join member M on C.emp_id = M.member_id where A.club_plan_no = #{clubPlanNo} order by A.club_plan_attendee_date desc

select N.*, M.member_name, M.renamed_filename, M.member_id from club_notice_comment N left join club_member C on N.club_member_no = C.club_member_no left join member M on C.emp_id = M.member_id where club_no = #{clubNo} order by club_notice_comment_date asc

select A.* , M.member_id, M.renamed_filename, M.member_name from club_plan_attendee A left join club_member C on A.club_member_no = C.club_member_no left join member M on C.emp_id = M.member_id order by A.club_plan_attendee_date desc
